Smart Hour Tracking

Log your hours with ease using our intelligent tracking system. Categorize work types and maintain detailed records of your progress.

📝

Digital Evaluations

Submit and receive evaluations digitally. Get feedback from journeymen and track your skill development over time.

📈

Career Progress

Monitor your apprenticeship journey with detailed progress tracking and milestone achievements.

🔄

Offline Support

Work without interruption. Log hours and fill evaluations even when offline - we'll sync when you're back online.

🔒

Secure Data

Your data is encrypted and securely stored. Access your records anytime, anywhere with cloud backup.

🤝

Community Connect

Connect with other apprentices and journeymen. Share experiences and grow together in the trade.
